mesh gunu

In Proto-Cuneiform and in Elamite gunu was often realized as a mesh similar to

Semantic significance ? causative ?

Gunification = add gunu to sign to modify/intensify/derive meaning:

ğ’…† IGI Auge eye
ğ’…Š IGI{GUNU} be bright, shine, see

ğ’ƒ¸ GAN tenu < ğ’ƒ· GAN gunu < ğ’ƒ° GAN
